entities.name: hagger
entities.description: A word spoken by Grawp that Harry does not understand. ("He opened his mouth even wider. “Hagger.”")

entities.name: gawp
entities.description: Grawp is a giant who is trying to communicate with the centaurs. ("Grawp’s feet, which were almost as long as Harry’s whole body.")

entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hermione thinks Grawp is trying to say Hagrid's name. ("I think he’s trying to say ‘Hagrid’!")

entities.name: magorian
entities.description: Magorian is a centaur who tells Grawp to leave. ("Get away from here, giant! You are not welcome among us!")

relationships.description: Grawp is trying to say Hagrid's name. ("I think he’s trying to say ‘Hagrid’!")
